__TOC__


CTO of <nowiki>[[http://www.comalia.com|Comalia]]</nowiki>, a small french software company specialized in SaaS/LAMP applications.

Switched to Linux in 1998. Involved in Ubuntu since summer 2009 mainly via advocacy and translations.

=== Contact information ===

* '''Launchpad''': <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~esunyer]]</nowiki>,
* '''E-mail''': emmanuel.sunyer@gmail.com,
* '''IRC''' (freenode): esunyer,
* '''Twitter''': esunyer.

=== Activities ===
* '''Advocacy'''
** Spreading the word every day (word of mouth, stickers, wearables...),
** Migrating all the computers of the company to Ubuntu (desktop and laptops),
** Installing Ubuntu on each computer of the family (desktops and laptops).

* '''Translations'''
** Member of ubuntu-fr-l10n.

=== Plans and ideas ===
Perceived quality is a very important matter to me and I believe that Devil is in the details. Then, my contribution shall be twofold:
* help complete and improve translations into French,
* get involved in the ''One Hundred Paper Cut'' project.
